column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:At Ride.az, we’re proud to offer innovative solutions in the transportation space that meet the needs and wants of our customers. To help us continue to grow our offerings, we’re in search of an product manager to lead our development team. As an ideal candidate, you will have a keen eye for gaps in consumer product offerings and the innovative mindset to fill them.Objectives of this Role- Drive the product and business-planning process across cross functional teams of the company- Analyze consumer needs, current market trends, and potential partnerships from an ROI and build vs. buy perspective- Assess current competitor offerings, seeking opportunities for differentiation- Analyze product requirements and develop appropriate programs to ensure they’re successful achieved- Develop, implement, and maintain production timelines across multiple departments- Appraise new product ideas and strategize appropriate to-market plansDaily and Monthly Responsibilities- Drive the execution of all product lifecycle processes for products, including product research, market research, competitive analysis, planning, positioning, roadmap development, requirements development, and product launch- Translate product strategy into detailed requirements for prototype construction and final product development by engineering teams- Create product strategy documents that describe business cases, high-level use cases, technical requirements, revenue, and ROI- Analyze market data to develop sales strategies, and define product objectives for effective marketing communications plans- Collaborate closely with engineering, production, marketing, and sales teams on the development, QA, and release of products and balance of resources to ensure success for the entire organization- Develop product positioning and messaging that differentiates Ride.az and its features across primary market segmentsNote: Work location is in an office located at Baku, Chinar plaza. Salary starts from 2,000 AZN.
column8: T?l?bl?r:- Strong experience in a dynamic product management role- Proven experience overseeing all elements of the product development lifecycle- Highly effective cross-functional team management- Previous experience delivering finely-tuned product marketing strategies- Exceptional writing and editing skills combined with strong presentation and public speaking skills- Fluent Russian language is mandatory, English is preferable

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Job Description:We are seeking a developer capable of creating Interactive VR/AR applications using C# and Unity3D. Your main responsibility will be to develop and test concepts, implement robust and scalable coding patterns, and support the development of ongoing projects within given requirements and deadlines.Capable candidates without VR experience will be given a period of a couple of months to prove their ability to master new technologies.Additional skills will give a preference but not mandatory:Good spoken RussianDeep knowledge of Unity3D (game loop, coroutines, physics, networking, rendering pipelines, shaders etc.) and proven experience in non-trivial projects.Modern Game Development PatternsImplementation of automated testing frameworks and unit testsExperience in optimizing memory and space usage to support older hardwareFamiliarity with continuous integrationFamiliarity with the .NET/Mono frameworksWe offer:Competitive salary with full legal registration and employment contractPerformance laptop and testing hardwareWorking hours 5 days a week, from 10:00 to 19:00Cozy office and free coffee
column8: T?l?bl?r:Job Requirements:3+ years of advanced C# developmentDeep understanding of OOP and SOLID principlesDecent knowledge of 3D computer graphics principles and techniquesGenuine interest in VR/AR technologiesExperience writing network code (Photon/Fusion, HTTP, OAuth2, etc.)Quickly master constantly implemented and updated SDKs and APIsIntermediate level of technical and spoken EnglishNatural capacity for constant self-learning in a dynamic technological environmentDesign, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable C# codeEnsuring the best performance, quality, and application response timeIdentifying bottlenecks and bugs and developing solutions for these problemsKnowledge of code versioning tools (Git, PlasticSCM)Skills for writing reusable C# librariesAbility to write clean, readable C# codeThoroughness in testing, responsibility for deadlinesGood work ethics, communication, and teamwork skills

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are looking for Azerbaijani colleagues seeking excellent career opportunities. We are offering very attractive package to work in the first-class properties.What we offer as a benefits package:Work Permit (all the related expenses are covered by the company)Labour ContractAttractive monthly salary package,Accommodation,Full board (3 times meal allowance a day),Laundry,Transportation,Credited mobile phone sim card,21 days’ annual vacation,Annual leave flight ticket every 12 months,Medical insurance.Working hours are 8 hours in a day, on a six days work week basis.

Send your CVs at: gm@pyramidcontinentalhotel.com info@horecaconsulting.az

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Role Synopsis:Pasha Construction LLC is looking for a highly experienced candidate to fulfil the position of the HSE Advisor within the Malls Division of Pasha Construction. Candidates meeting the below stated criteria are requested to send their CV/Resume.Key Accountabilities:Ensure all company policies regarding health & safety, environmental requirements are met and improved upon as identified.Fully accountable for achieving all relevant KPIsAll H&S and Environmental compliance requirements and ensure they are effective for the company and are delivered throughout the businessDevelopment of environmental objectives and targets, and their environmental management programs.Identify environmental aspects and impacts, carrying out relevant risk assessments.Host monthly HSE meetings, reporting back on environmental compliance issues and other related issues.Advise senior management in obtaining and complying with environmental legal and contractual requirements.To perform duties and functions in line with the HSE regulations of the Republic of AzerbaijanSend your CV to hr@pashamalls.az indicating “HSE advisor” in the subject line.
column8: T?l?bl?r:Essential Education:A recognised qualification in the relevant discipline or equivalent, within HSEEssential Criteria:Working experience in health, safety and environment field at least 3 years, experience in malls or commercial centres can be an advantage Excellent communication skills both oral and writtenFluent in Azerbaijani and EnglishHaving all legally necessary education and certification to work as Health and Safety Advisor.Desirable Criteria:Ability to handle stress (peaks in workload and frequent deadlines)

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Job Description:AS Inshaat-N LLC is currently seeking a Receptionist at our main office to oversee front desk operations that will include answering and responding to incoming calls, greeting and directing visitors and general administrative duties.Duties:Maintain front desk phone system to include answering incoming calls, responding to caller inquiries, directing calls as appropriate, and taking and giving accurate messages;Greet and direct visitors as appropriate based on purpose of their visit;Providing prompt and professional responses to visitor questions and concerns, while maintaining poise and self-control under stress and in emergencies;Collecting and documenting visitor statistics and maintaining the visitor log;Assist with personnel file maintenance following corporate HR guidelines;Assisting with document production, managing simple databases and preparing mailings;Maintain office supplies and organization of office in general;Assisting with receiving and/or delivering packages and mail.Interested candidates are welcome to send their CVs both in Azerbaijani and in English language by indicating the name of the vacancy in the subject line of the letter.Send your CV to hr@asinshaat-n.az indicating “Receptionist” in the subject line.
column8: T?l?bl?r:Requirements:Qualified candidates for the Receptionist position will meet the minimum requirements, as described below:High school diploma (or equivalent) required;Excellent verbal and written communication skills required with the ability to successfully interact at all levels of the organization while functioning as a team player;Excellent computer skills including Microsoft Office products, internet and websites required.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are looking for Marketing Specialist for one of our client. If you're a passionate self-starter, we offer you a perfect place to grow your career. Apply today!Responsibilities:Assist marketing manager and team in development and execution of marketing campaigns, including content creation, new product launches, social media and etc.Collaborate with other internal teams (e.g. product and sales) to develop and monitor strategic marketing initiativesAnalyze and report on the performance and efficiency of campaignsConduct market research and analyze trends to identify new marketing opportunitiesWrite, proofread, and edit creative and technical content across different mediumsSalary: 800-1200 aznIf you are interested in this position, you are welcome to contact as at cv@hrcell.az . Please, state the position in the subject line of email.
column8: T?l?bl?r:Requirements:Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, communications, or a related fieldExperience in marketingFluency in azerbaijan, russian and english languages is mustGood knowledge of various marketing and analytics toolsStrong analytical skillsGood written and verbal communication skillsSkilled in writing and editing content with an attention to detailStrong prioritization, organization, and project management skills

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are looking for a detail-orientated Tax Senior Specialist to be responsible for tax-related tasks. The tax specialist's responsibilities include preparing all tax compliance, assisting in audits, and responding to tax correspondence.The main duties of the successful candidate will be:Dealing with different tax and accounting issues;Preparation and review of monthly internal and external reports;Review of the reports to the state authorities;Regular communication with clients and the state authorities;Advising clients on accounting and tax issues;Leading and training junior staff;Other duties related to the performance of job responsibilities.Interested candidates may send resumes to cv@hrcell.az by indicating the title of the applied position.
column8: T?l?bl?r:Requirements:High degree of self-motivation and strong career aspirations;Minimum 4-5 years of experience in tax consulting and accounting;Good knowledge of financial accounting and tax legislation;Degree in Accounting, Business, Economics;Advanced written and spoken Azeri and English, Russian will be an asset;Ability to work in an environment of pressing deadlines and dynamic conditions;Good knowledge of MS Office, especially ExcelGood numerical skills.A keen eye for details.Outstanding analytical skills.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:At Ride.az, we’re proud to offer innovative solutions in the transportation space that meet the needs and wants of our customers. To help us continue to grow our offerings, we’re in search of an product manager to lead our development team. As an ideal candidate, you will have a keen eye for gaps in consumer product offerings and the innovative mindset to fill them.Objectives of this Role- Drive the product and business-planning process across cross functional teams of the company- Analyze consumer needs, current market trends, and potential partnerships from an ROI and build vs. buy perspective- Assess current competitor offerings, seeking opportunities for differentiation- Analyze product requirements and develop appropriate programs to ensure they’re successful achieved- Develop, implement, and maintain production timelines across multiple departments- Appraise new product ideas and strategize appropriate to-market plansDaily and Monthly Responsibilities- Drive the execution of all product lifecycle processes for products, including product research, market research, competitive analysis, planning, positioning, roadmap development, requirements development, and product launch- Translate product strategy into detailed requirements for prototype construction and final product development by engineering teams- Create product strategy documents that describe business cases, high-level use cases, technical requirements, revenue, and ROI- Analyze market data to develop sales strategies, and define product objectives for effective marketing communications plans- Collaborate closely with engineering, production, marketing, and sales teams on the development, QA, and release of products and balance of resources to ensure success for the entire organization- Develop product positioning and messaging that differentiates Ride.az and its features across primary market segmentsNote: Work location is in an office located at Baku, Chinar plaza. Salary starts from 2,000 AZN.
column8: T?l?bl?r:- Strong experience in a dynamic product management role- Proven experience overseeing all elements of the product development lifecycle- Highly effective cross-functional team management- Previous experience delivering finely-tuned product marketing strategies- Exceptional writing and editing skills combined with strong presentation and public speaking skills- Fluent Russian language is mandatory, English is preferable

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Job Description:We are seeking a developer capable of creating Interactive VR/AR applications using C# and Unity3D. Your main responsibility will be to develop and test concepts, implement robust and scalable coding patterns, and support the development of ongoing projects within given requirements and deadlines.Capable candidates without VR experience will be given a period of a couple of months to prove their ability to master new technologies.Additional skills will give a preference but not mandatory:Good spoken RussianDeep knowledge of Unity3D (game loop, coroutines, physics, networking, rendering pipelines, shaders etc.) and proven experience in non-trivial projects.Modern Game Development PatternsImplementation of automated testing frameworks and unit testsExperience in optimizing memory and space usage to support older hardwareFamiliarity with continuous integrationFamiliarity with the .NET/Mono frameworksWe offer:Competitive salary with full legal registration and employment contractPerformance laptop and testing hardwareWorking hours 5 days a week, from 10:00 to 19:00Cozy office and free coffee
column8: T?l?bl?r:Job Requirements:3+ years of advanced C# developmentDeep understanding of OOP and SOLID principlesDecent knowledge of 3D computer graphics principles and techniquesGenuine interest in VR/AR technologiesExperience writing network code (Photon/Fusion, HTTP, OAuth2, etc.)Quickly master constantly implemented and updated SDKs and APIsIntermediate level of technical and spoken EnglishNatural capacity for constant self-learning in a dynamic technological environmentDesign, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable C# codeEnsuring the best performance, quality, and application response timeIdentifying bottlenecks and bugs and developing solutions for these problemsKnowledge of code versioning tools (Git, PlasticSCM)Skills for writing reusable C# librariesAbility to write clean, readable C# codeThoroughness in testing, responsibility for deadlinesGood work ethics, communication, and teamwork skills

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are looking for Azerbaijani colleagues seeking excellent career opportunities. We are offering very attractive package to work in the first-class properties.What we offer as a benefits package:Work Permit (all the related expenses are covered by the company)Labour ContractAttractive monthly salary package,Accommodation,Full board (3 times meal allowance a day),Laundry,Transportation,Credited mobile phone sim card,21 days’ annual vacation,Annual leave flight ticket every 12 months,Medical insurance.Working hours are 8 hours in a day, on a six days work week basis.

Send your CVs at: gm@pyramidcontinentalhotel.com info@horecaconsulting.az

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Role Synopsis:Pasha Construction LLC is looking for a highly experienced candidate to fulfil the position of the HSE Advisor within the Malls Division of Pasha Construction. Candidates meeting the below stated criteria are requested to send their CV/Resume.Key Accountabilities:Ensure all company policies regarding health & safety, environmental requirements are met and improved upon as identified.Fully accountable for achieving all relevant KPIsAll H&S and Environmental compliance requirements and ensure they are effective for the company and are delivered throughout the businessDevelopment of environmental objectives and targets, and their environmental management programs.Identify environmental aspects and impacts, carrying out relevant risk assessments.Host monthly HSE meetings, reporting back on environmental compliance issues and other related issues.Advise senior management in obtaining and complying with environmental legal and contractual requirements.To perform duties and functions in line with the HSE regulations of the Republic of AzerbaijanSend your CV to hr@pashamalls.az indicating “HSE advisor” in the subject line.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Job Description:AS Inshaat-N LLC is currently seeking a Receptionist at our main office to oversee front desk operations that will include answering and responding to incoming calls, greeting and directing visitors and general administrative duties.Duties:Maintain front desk phone system to include answering incoming calls, responding to caller inquiries, directing calls as appropriate, and taking and giving accurate messages;Greet and direct visitors as appropriate based on purpose of their visit;Providing prompt and professional responses to visitor questions and concerns, while maintaining poise and self-control under stress and in emergencies;Collecting and documenting visitor statistics and maintaining the visitor log;Assist with personnel file maintenance following corporate HR guidelines;Assisting with document production, managing simple databases and preparing mailings;Maintain office supplies and organization of office in general;Assisting with receiving and/or delivering packages and mail.Interested candidates are welcome to send their CVs both in Azerbaijani and in English language by indicating the name of the vacancy in the subject line of the letter.Send your CV to hr@asinshaat-n.az indicating “Receptionist” in the subject line.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are looking for Marketing Specialist for one of our client. If you're a passionate self-starter, we offer you a perfect place to grow your career. Apply today!Responsibilities:Assist marketing manager and team in development and execution of marketing campaigns, including content creation, new product launches, social media and etc.Collaborate with other internal teams (e.g. product and sales) to develop and monitor strategic marketing initiativesAnalyze and report on the performance and efficiency of campaignsConduct market research and analyze trends to identify new marketing opportunitiesWrite, proofread, and edit creative and technical content across different mediumsSalary: 800-1200 aznIf you are interested in this position, you are welcome to contact as at cv@hrcell.az . Please, state the position in the subject line of email.
column8: T?l?bl?r:Requirements:Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, communications, or a related fieldExperience in marketingFluency in azerbaijan, russian and english languages is mustGood knowledge of various marketing and analytics toolsStrong analytical skillsGood written and verbal communication skillsSkilled in writing and editing content with an attention to detailStrong prioritization, organization, and project management skills

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are looking for a detail-orientated Tax Senior Specialist to be responsible for tax-related tasks. The tax specialist's responsibilities include preparing all tax compliance, assisting in audits, and responding to tax correspondence.The main duties of the successful candidate will be:Dealing with different tax and accounting issues;Preparation and review of monthly internal and external reports;Review of the reports to the state authorities;Regular communication with clients and the state authorities;Advising clients on accounting and tax issues;Leading and training junior staff;Other duties related to the performance of job responsibilities.Interested candidates may send resumes to cv@hrcell.az by indicating the title of the applied position.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Salary: Competitive.About Intership Period:During the 1st month of internship candidates will be taught and trained with required skills and tools. column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Job Description:Investigating user experience design requirements for our suite of digital assets.Developing and conceptualizing a comprehensive UI/UX design strategy for the brand.Producing high-quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.Designing UI elements and tools such as navigation menus, search boxes, tabs, and widgets for our digital assets.Testing UI elements such as CTAs, banners, page layouts, page designs, page flows, and target links for landing pages.Collaborating with the marketing team, and internal and external designers to ensure the creation and delivery of tailored experiences for the digital user.Providing advice and guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies and testing activities in order to analyze and predict user behavior.Adhering to style standards on typography and graphic design.How to apply?Please send your CV to info@decordtech.com email address. Applications will be reviewed against position requirements and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.Contact: +994 - 708889808, Aygun
column8: T?l?bl?r:Responsibilities:Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.Identifying web-based user interactions.Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.Monitoring and improving front-end performance.Documenting application changes and developing updates.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Company: TranslationGenius™ / Genius Group InternationalJob Title: Translation Project Manager AssistantAbout TranslationGenius™As a proud member of Genius Group International, – TranslationGenius™ speaks all the official languages spoken in the world. With the growth of Internet and global communications, it is easier than ever to reach an audience that’s thousands of miles away – but only with the right translation services provider.Currently we are recruiting Translation Manager Assistants to help our Project Manager to run our daily translation management projects.Position Requirements:• University degree in translations, English studies, linguistics or other related fields• Minimum 1 year experience project manager, project manager assistant or a translator; new graduates are also welcomed to apply• Excellent spoken and written communication skills in English and Azeri. Russian and other languages will be an asset• Good understanding of translation project lifecycle• Proficient with common office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Acrobat etc.)• Knowledge of translation memory tools (Trados, MemoQ, Smartcat etc) is desirable• High attention to details, ability to learn quickly• Strong project management and organizational skillsResponsibilities:• Helping the Project Manage to manage translation projects• Communicate with international clients regarding project status, queries from translators, and other issues• Assisting in recruitment and assessment of freelance translators / updating the translator database• In-house translation quality control (figures and layout)• Contacting to potential international and local clients and introducing translation services of the companyConditionsThe job is promising, dynamic and interesting. We work 5 days a week. Salary is 700 AZN + plus bonuses with a possible growth opportunity based on performance and experience.Please apply with covering letter (a summary about yourself and why we need to choose you) and CV with a photo to hello@7geniusgroup.com , by 7th January. column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Vacancy - System Administrator*To administrate IT systems (UNIX, Solaris, Linux);*To support IT operations strategy;*To find out and solve Windows/UNIX based system problems;*To collaborate with vendor and providers and manage agreements;*To optimize the IT operation’s products, services and processes;*To pro-actively support and enhance operational status of IT systems;*To follow IT Security Policies and guidelines.Please, send us your CV to aysel.h@gdg.az referring on which position you are applying.
column8: T?l?bl?r:Position requirements- University degree (in Information Technologies is preferred);- At least 3 years of work experience in relevant field (experience in telecommunications is a plus);- Microsoft (MCP, MCSA), Red Hat (RHCSA, RHCE) certificates are preferred;- Experience with relevant WAN/LAN technologies, server virtualization, storage, security technologies, and databases;- Knowledge of MS Active Directory, MS Exchange 2003/2010/2013, Windows 2003/2008/2012/2016;- Strong experience with Change and Release Management and ITIL Frameworks;- Knowledge of Linux (RHEL, Oracle Linux, Suse), Solaris, BSD;- Excellent knowledge of Storage Area networks and protocols (FCP,FCIP,FCoE), multi-pathing technologies (MPIO), disks, volumes, mount points;- Knowledge of firewalls, routers, switches, DNS, DHCP, VPNs, FTP, internet protocls;- Knowledge of IT Hardware concepts (RAID, SAN, x86 Architecture, SCSI, ISCSI, FCP, FCIP);- Knowledge of Azerbaijani (Fluent), English and Rus (Intermediate).

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are looking for the position of Chief IT Auditor / Leading IT Auditor / IT Auditor at the Internal Audit Department to one of the leading Banks.NOTE: Preference will be given to candidates with practical and in-depth knowledge of SQL, Oracle, Infrastructure (Hardware and Software, Network, Data, etc.), backup and virtualization, or theoretical knowledge of Unix and Linux softwareIf you are interesting in this role and for more info please send your CV to aynur.gasimova@ires.az
column8: T?l?bl?r:Requirements:• Higher education in Information Technology or other relevant field;• At least 1-3 years of experience in IT auditing or IT risk management;• Strong communication skills;• Having problem-solving skills;• Analytical thinking style;• Has not received a disciplinary sanction (written warning or reprimand) in the last 6 months.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:We are urgently looking for Project Assistant for one of our clients. Responsibilities: ·        Write letters and send them to appropriate bodies, and receive incoming mails·        Create specific strategies for easier and effective execution of projects·        Maintain contacts with potential stakeholders who may be interested in investing in projects·        Supervise tasks assigned to project workers as instructed by the director·        Supervise project workers and ensure that they stick to project specification and guidelines·        Keep records of all information related to project for documentation, clarification and presentation to management·        Draft project proposal ideas and present them to the director with convincing proof for approval·        Intermediate between the director and other workers to prevent agitations that may hinder the smooth flow of project execution·        Draft project budget on a monthly basis and ensure that it meets all necessary protocols How to apply?Dear interested candidates, please send your CV to info@peoplepro.az by indicating “Project Assistant” in the subject of your email. Please be advised that only shortlisted candidates will be invited to the further stages of the recruitment process.

column7: ?? haqq?nda m?lumat:Job description:Conduct audit, further audit and special audit projects assigned according to the approved Annual Audit Plan and the Audit Committee's instruction;Assess the effectiveness of risk management, monitoring and management processes carried out within the audit project;Supervise the work of employees under his/her subordination under audit project;Assist in the development of reports on audit results;Assist in the development of the work program for the audit project;Ensure the implementation of audit procedures to identify shortcomings within the audit project;Ensure accuracy, quality and effectiveness in the developed reports;Assist in the development of summary reports on the activities of the Internal Audit Department per instruction of the Director of Internal Audit Department;Assist in the development of scope and timing report for audit (Retain management); Participate in the evaluation of the work of employees under his/her subordination within the involved audit project;Perform other tasks assigned by the Project Manager and Director of the Internal Audit Department. How to apply:    Interested candidates are requested to submit:CVs should be sent by December 03, 2021.Send your CV to jobsaudit@pasha-holding.az indicating “Senior Auditor” in the subject line.Attention: The candidates will go through an initial CV screening review. Those candidates who succeed based on CV screening will be contacted via email and/or phone and will be invited to interview.
column8: T?l?bl?r:Experience, Competencies, and Skills Required:Higher economic or legal education (at least four years of experience in related fields in case of high education in other fields);Relevant work experience: Overall over 4 years experience with over 3 years in audit-related positions;Preference will be given to the candidates with relevant professional qualifications CIA / CFSA / ACCA / CPA / CIMA / CISA / CFA (L1);Knowledge of relevant sector and business processes to conduct audit procedures;Knowledge of the normative and legal documents drawn up by the executive body regulating banking and insurance sectors is desirable;Analytical and communication skills;Computer literacy and ability to work with relevant software (MS Windows products).Available for business trips;Excellent command of Business English and Azerbaijani languages;
